StringTable.String: Our reputation for wisdom has spread throughout the galaxy. Any bargaining table we find ourselves at soon begins slanting in our direction.

StringTable.Label: KrynnMajestyTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The Way now sells itself, and so perfect a spiritual life do our people live that people throughout the galaxy clamor to join the Path themselves.

StringTable.Label: KrynnUnitedPlanetsLobbyist_Dec
StringTable.String: The United Planets is filled with unbelievers. But our wisdom has slowly begun to open their minds, and so respected are we that now our votes go a bit further than before.

StringTable.Label: KrynnUnitedPlanetsClout_Dec
StringTable.String: So convinced of our wisdom and sincerity are our allies, that they will now vote with us on all United Planets measures. This surrender of authority is but a first step; the Path beckons them.

StringTable.Label: KrynnThePathTech_Name
StringTable.String: The Path

StringTable.Label: KrynnThePathTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the Krynn Consulate and Ministry.

StringTable.Label: KrynnThePathTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The Path is the primary doctrine of the ancient Krynniac religion. It is the set of core teachings, ideals, and laws that the Krynn must live by to bring them closer to learning the true Way of the universe.

StringTable.Label: KrynnThePathSpecialization1_Name
StringTable.String: The Path of Wisdom

StringTable.Label: KrynnThePathSpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases entire civilization's Influence.

StringTable.Label: KrynnThePathSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: The way one walks down the Path can attract and influence others to begin their own journey. By encouraging Krynn with exposure to outside parties to better represent ourselves and our ways, we can more easily convince others to join the Path.

StringTable.Label: KrynnThePathSpecialization2_Name
StringTable.String: The Path of Joy

StringTable.Label: KrynnThePathSpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases entire civilization's Approval.

StringTable.Label: KrynnThePathSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Those who commit fully to the Path enter a state of inner serenity, and find that the concerns of the secular world seem less important to their eyes. Encouraging this commitment amongst our people will lead to higher approval across our civilization.

StringTable.Label: KrynnTheCallingTech_Name
StringTable.String: The Calling

StringTable.Label: KrynnTheCallingTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the Krynniac Temples.

StringTable.Label: KrynnTheCallingTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Once a Krynn has commenced along the Path, the next step is for them to find his or her Calling. It is though service to their Calling that the Krynn contribute to the overarching goal of our people, spreading the Krynniac Way.

StringTable.Label: KrynnTheCallingOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: The Call of Order

StringTable.Label: KrynnTheCallingOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases entire civilization's Influence.

StringTable.Label: KrynnTheCallingOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Those that hear the Call of Order have a special urge to travel the distant stars, showing others the Path, and convincing them to leave their close-minded ways behind and join the Krynn.

StringTable.Label: KrynnTheCallingOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Call of Peace

StringTable.Label: KrynnTheCallingOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases entire civilization's Approval.

StringTable.Label: KrynnTheCallingOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Those that hear the Call of Peace are filled with an overflowing joy, and work tirelessly to share it with all of their fellow Krynn.

StringTable.Label: KrynnTheCallingOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Call to Action

StringTable.Label: KrynnTheCallingOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces maintenance and manufacturing cost of Krynniac Improvements.

StringTable.Label: KrynnTheCallingOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Those that hear the Call to Action take great pride in the work of their devout brethren, and donate assets and labor to support their work and help spread the Way.

StringTable.Label: KrynnTheOrderTech_Name
StringTable.String: The Order

StringTable.Label: KrynnTheOrderTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the Krynniac Order and Sanctuary.

StringTable.Label: KrynnTheOrderTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The Krynniac Orders were founded to help Krynn take the last step on the Path, and find the Way. These Orders are the glue which hold the Krynn together, ensuring the Krynniac Way will eventually be found by all.

StringTable.Label: KrynnTheOrderFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: The Order of Influence

StringTable.Label: KrynnTheOrderFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases entire civilization's Influence.

StringTable.Label: KrynnTheOrderFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Members of The Order of Influence travel beyond our borders as missionaries, advocates, and advisors, using their specialized training to teach unenlightened minds the advantages that following the Path might offer.

StringTable.Label: KrynnTheOrderFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: The Order of Hope

StringTable.Label: KrynnTheOrderFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases entire civilization's Approval.

StringTable.Label: KrynnTheOrderFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Members of The Order of Hope understand that enlightenment begins from within, and dedicate their efforts to serving the needs of their home worlds, making sure that no one that walks the Path suffers unnecessarily.

StringTable.Label: KrynnTheOrderFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: The Order of Service

StringTable.Label: KrynnTheOrderFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces maintenance and manufacturing cost of Krynniac Improvements.

StringTable.Label: KrynnTheOrderFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Members of the Order of Service commit themselves to the construction and maintenance of the Krynniac infrastructure, dedicating their lives to the facilities that ensure the Path can be found by all.

StringTable.Label: KrynnTheWayTech_Name
StringTable.String: The Way

StringTable.Label: KrynnTheWayTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the Krynniac Oracle.

StringTable.Label: KrynnTheWayTech_Dec
StringTable.String: At the end of the Path one finds the Way. The Way reveals the truth of our universe to those who behold it, and teaches those so enlightened that they must forever help others walk the Path, until all beings in the universe live as one.

StringTable.Label: KrynnTheWayPerfection1_Name
StringTable.String: The Way of Leadership

StringTable.Label: KrynnTheWayPerfection1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases entire civilization's Influence.

StringTable.Label: KrynnTheWayPerfection1_Dec
StringTable.String: Those that follow the Way must be able to educate and influence the lost. A select few choose to walk the Way of Leadership, to better equip them for securing the future of the Krynn, and all sentient life.

StringTable.Label: KrynnTheWayPerfection2_Name
StringTable.String: The Way of Bliss

StringTable.Label: KrynnTheWayPerfection2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases entire civilization's Approval.

StringTable.Label: KrynnTheWayPerfection2_Dec
StringTable.String: The Way of Bliss teaches that for the Krynn to bring all sentient life to the Path we must achieve perfect harmony within our own civilization first.

StringTable.Label: KrynnThePathofShadows_Name
StringTable.String: The Path of Shadows

StringTable.Label: KrynnThePathofShadows_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the Shadow Temple.

StringTable.Label: KrynnThePathofShadows_Dec
StringTable.String: There have always been those who cannot find the Path, and even some who threaten its existence. To combat these influences, the Krynniac faith has established the Path of Shadows, whose followers preserve the prosperity of the Krynn in their own way.

StringTable.Label: KrynnStellarEmigration_Dec
StringTable.String: All Krynn, regardless of training, understand the importance of teaching others how to walk the Path. We should do everything in our power to enable our people to travel the galaxy spreading the truth.

StringTable.Label: KrynnCulturalAssimilation_Dec
StringTable.String: New arrivals to our colonies, even those just passing through, must be introduced to the Path as quickly as possible, in the manner they're most receptive to. Assimilation centers will train the Krynn who do this vital work.

StringTable.Label: KrynnCulturalDomination_Dec
StringTable.String: The Path is the only means of achieving salvation, and all who claim otherwise are heretics. With these latest cultural buildings, the light of the Path shall shine brightly on all of civilized space.

StringTable.Label: KrynnCulturalAffinity_Dec
StringTable.String: The Way beckons us closer, as civilized minds throughout the galaxy begin their journey down the Path. On the horizon, the light of salvation rises.

StringTable.Label: KrynnXenoCommerce_Dec
StringTable.String: Our economy is too secular for most Krynn, and long been beneath the interests of all but the Secret Order. Nevertheless, we won't be able to spread the Way with faith alone. Improved economic structures will help fill our treasury.

StringTable.Label: KrynnCommerceSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: The Secret Order would like us to adjust the regulations affecting some very specific businesses which they presumably have an interest in. They promise this will lead to more funds for the treasury though, so a fair trade it would seem.

StringTable.Label: KrynnCommerceSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Additional trade routes will allow our treasury to grow faster, and give the Secret Order an additional avenue for pursuing their own type of profit.

StringTable.Label: KrynnXenoEconomics_Dec
StringTable.String: New economic buildings will provide the marketplaces our private sector require to make their transactions, and, indirectly, provide our masters in the Secret Order more transactions to skim.

StringTable.Label: KrynnShadowEnforcers_Name
StringTable.String: Shadow Enforcers

StringTable.Label: KrynnShadowEnforcers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the Enforcement Temple.

StringTable.Label: KrynnShadowEnforcers_Dec
StringTable.String: The Path does not permit exploitation without authorization. Authorization granted to those that walk the Path of Shadows, who are free to collect tithes from devoted merchants and bankers to ensure their businesses suffer no misfortunes.

StringTable.Label: KrynnInterstellarBanking_Dec
StringTable.String: The limited speed of communication across our vast civilization has opened the door to new types of fraud. New economic structures will help eliminate or at least bring this fraud under our control, boosting our economic income.

StringTable.Label: KrynnEconomicFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: The Secret Order recommends we increase trading activity, which will increase our treasury at the same time it provides cover for their own "trading" activities.

StringTable.Label: KrynnEconomicFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: If we give the say-so, the Secret Order can deploy its members to the worlds of our neighbors, gathering information that we can use to our advantage during trade negotiations.

StringTable.Label: KrynnEconomicFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Visitors to our worlds should be coming for spiritual enlightenment, not amusements. But when the close-minded refuse to see the Path in front of them, we might as well profit as much as we can from their visit.

StringTable.Label: KrynnFinancialSectorsTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The complexity of our secular financial sector is baffling to us. But the Secret Order assure us it will lead us to the Way, and that new financial structures will arrive us there sooner.

StringTable.Label: KrynnGalacticStockMarket_Dec
StringTable.String: Letting businesses from across the galaxy trade portions of themselves in our stock markets is a confusing idea. The profits that flow our way are substantial, but is this really leading us towards salvation?

StringTable.Label: KrynnInterstellarTrade_Dec
StringTable.String: Trade provides an opportunity to enrich ourselves from the appetites our neighbors have for our goods. The Secret Order thrive on trading like this, and encourage us to actively pursue it.

StringTable.Label: KrynnGalacticTrade_Dec
StringTable.String: Fixed trading hubs will not only increase our ability to trade, they'll ensure that more goods pass within sight of the Secret Order and their sticky hands.

StringTable.Label: KrynnGalacticFacilitation_Dec
StringTable.String: As our trading ports grow ever larger, we see now the wisdom of such trade. These funds, which would have gone to waste in the hands of the unbelievers, can be used to bring the Path right back to their doorstep.

StringTable.Label: KrynnTradeMasters_Dec
StringTable.String: Our trade empire is almost complete, every corner of the galaxy now tapped by members of the Shadow Path for potential profits. Our latest trading facilities will only extend our fingers further.

StringTable.Label: KrynnShadowTrade_Name
StringTable.String: Shadow Trade

StringTable.Label: KrynnShadowTrade_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the Income of trade routes, by allowing the trade of dubious goods.

StringTable.Label: KrynnShadowTrade_Dec
StringTable.String: The Path of Shadows teaches that unbelievers will destroy themselves if given what they want most. Properly equipped with the right "merchandise," our traders can now profit from their customers' gluttony.

StringTable.Label: KrynnKrynnTourismTech_Name
StringTable.String: Celestial Tourism

StringTable.Label: KrynnKrynnTourismTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Begin collecting tourism income.

StringTable.Label: KrynnKrynnTourismTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Word of the Krynniac faith and the salvation it represents has spread throughout the galaxy. Many new races are coming to our worlds to take their first hesitant steps along the Path. We should do everything we can to prepare for them.

StringTable.Label: KrynnIndustrialSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: With experience, and suffused with the wisdom the Path offers them, our colonists have found a number of ways to improve our basic colonial structures.

StringTable.Label: KrynnConstructionOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Krynn who follow the Shadow Path have long struggled with blasphemers in our manufacturing sector who siphon funds off for their own sinister needs. We must do everything we can to stop them.

StringTable.Label: KrynnManufacturingFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: The more orderly a Krynn's internal mind, the more orderly they make the world around them. By preferentially promoting our most enlightened manufacturing workers, we might hope to improve our manufacturing sector.

StringTable.Label: KrynnIndustrialMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Our people have mastered manufacturing in much the same way we have mastered the Path that leads to the Way. But we are mortals, far from perfection. More improvements remain to be found.

StringTable.Label: KrynnResearchOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Our researchers are more committed to the Path than almost all other Krynn, but remain naive about the ways of the world. With the right oversight, we can ensure their work spreads the Path in the manner best suiting our needs.

StringTable.Label: KrynnTechnologicalFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Our researchers assure us that if we begin specializing our research efforts, this will lead to tools that can help spread the Path faster.

StringTable.Label: KrynnPlanetarySpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: Our farmers are simple folk, with but a rudimentary understanding of the Path. All they care for is dirt, and the tools to work with it. So we shall give them better tools.

StringTable.Label: KrynnAgriculturalOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Even something as simple as our farms cannot remain free from waste. The Secret Order is asking, no, demanding, that we do something about it.

StringTable.Label: KrynnFarmingFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Our farmers are simple folk, following a simplifed version of the Path, and sometimes resent the attention we pay to them. But the importance of food production to our society is to much to leave it entirely in their hands. Our farms must get better.

StringTable.Label: KrynnAgriculturalMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Krynn's farms are among the best in the galaxy, the skill, faith, and industry of our farmers an example to us all. But a few improvements remain to be made to their practices.

StringTable.Label: KrynnColonizationFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: If we can improve the conditions for the poor fools living on extreme worlds, they'll surely be grateful to us. The Secret Order loves it when favors are owed to them.

StringTable.Label: KrynnBiospherePerfection_Dec
StringTable.String: Using forced colonization of the most extreme worlds as punishment was an ideal stick to wield during inquisitions. But the galaxy is too crowded to let these worlds remain unproductive.

StringTable.Label: KrynnInterstellarSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: Our faithful researchers have come up with a number of ways to improve our equipment and navigational techniques.

StringTable.Label: KrynnIonOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Apparently our new Ion Drive systems had a number of inefficiencies in their design which need to be corrected. We pray this was an honest mistake, and not a sign of our researchers being corrupted by heretical thoughts.

StringTable.Label: KrynnWarpFieldFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: It seems that new hyperdrive technologies always have room for improvement, and that this doesn't imply corruption on the part of our researchers at all. We had prayed this was the case.

StringTable.Label: KrynnHyperwarpMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Krynn drives are among the most powerful in the galaxy, the brilliance of our researchers as sure a sign of the righteousness of the Way as anything else we can offer. And still those blessed minds insist they can do better.

StringTable.Label: KrynnSensorOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Our researchers are constantly hard at work on our sensor systems, looking for minor improvements while still pursuing the next breakthrough.

StringTable.Label: KrynnEnergyFieldFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Many of our ships' crews regularly blaspheme against the Path and tinker with the equipment sent for them to do their work. We typically look the other way, but when their adjustments lead to improvements, we'd be fools not to capitalize on them.

StringTable.Label: KrynnSensorMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: It is of no surprise that the Krynn would master sensor technology so easily. Knowledge is the cornerstone of everything we are. Our wisest and most pious scientists are now putting the finishing touches on their masterpieces.

StringTable.Label: KrynnPrecursorRelicFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: The Precursor relics we find have strange effects on the Krynn, evoking a sense of wonder, excitement, and even greed. With our skills at manipulating sentiment, we should be able to capitalize on specific benefits if we choose.

StringTable.Label: KrynnLifeSupportOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Although we aim to bring salvation, even to the deceased, we cannot allow Krynn to perish without cause. Our life support systems must get better.

StringTable.Label: KrynnSupportFieldFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Field-based life support systems are a little messy. We'll need to do something about this, lest our crews lose faith in our stewardship.

StringTable.Label: KrynnLifeSupportMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Krynn crews are now as well fed and cared for as those in our colonies. Even better perhaps, for some of our less favored colonists at least. But a few more improvements remain to be made in these systems.

StringTable.Label: KrynnOrbitalSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: Orbital construction is hard to maintain control of, with too many moving parts to buy off, and the workers too wealthy to be deterred by their religious obligations. We may require more severe management techniques.

StringTable.Label: KrynnZeroGravityOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Orbital construction remains a dangerous occupation, with many unexplain accidents sapping productivity. We must do what we can to limit the influence of unfriendly factions in this sector, if only for the sake of our faithful workers.

StringTable.Label: KrynnOrbitalConstructionFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: With the worst corrupting influences removed from our shipyards, we can safely allow our innocent researchers on site to allow them to work their wonderous magic, improving our construction.

StringTable.Label: KrynnHullMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: As good as they already are, with the right motivation, our workers and designers should be able to make better ships. And between faith and money, we've got the best motivational tools known to sentient life on hand.

StringTable.Label: KrynnCarrierFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Fighter pilots are extremely pious, dedicated to the Path like few others. This makes them not only incorruptible, but reliable sources of wisdom. We should listen to their ideas for improving our carriers.

StringTable.Label: KrynnLogisticalOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Our newly established logistical seminaries are not only training a new generation of logistical workers, they're also coming up with surprising improvements we can implement to our existing operations.

StringTable.Label: KrynnWeaponsSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: Our weapons researchers recommend we dedicate our efforts on a specific field of weapons technology, which will make it easier to develop more destructive weapons. These followers of the Shadow Path are a bloodthirsty lot.

StringTable.Label: KrynnBeamWeaponOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Our weapons researchers regularly push past boundaries more peaceful minds would stop at, their lust for destructive potential pushing the limits of our understanding of materials science. The results are hard to argue with though.

StringTable.Label: KrynnHighEnergyFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Our weapons researchers have found several mistakes in their work on our beam systems. Their self-flagellation is not part of any Path we sanctify, but if it leads to improvements, we're willing to look the other way.

StringTable.Label: KrynnBeamWeaponMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Our weapons researchers warn that our weapons are nearing perfect efficiency. But the Path, even the Shadow Path, does not permit rest. They must always look to do better.

StringTable.Label: KrynnMissileOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Our weapons researchers have been busy demolishing asteroids with their new toys. A strange bunch, but it's not our place to question them, and the Secret Order seem pleased with the improvements they're finding for our missile systems.

StringTable.Label: KrynnWarheadFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Our weapons researchers have cloistered themselves in an explosives testing facility. There is a lot more laughter eminating than is befitting such a pious group, but they will ultimately be judged by their results.

StringTable.Label: KrynnPayloadMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Our weapons researchers' brilliance is a troubling thing, constrained only by the limits set forth by the mysterious Path of Shadows. But the results cannot be argued with; Krynn warheads are now feared throughout the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: KrynnKineticOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Our weapons researchers are conducting strange, scientific rituals on the energy delivery systems of our kinetic weapons. They promise this could lead to a number of improvements in these systems.

StringTable.Label: KrynnKineticAccelerationFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: A private company has developed a new form of superconductor. Elements of the Shadow Path have already "acquired" this technology, and provided it to our weapons researchers to help improve our kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: KrynnKineticMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Krynn vessels are now renowned throughout the galaxy for the speed and force with which we can deliver enlightenment upon unbelievers. But our weapons researchers aren't done yet, and claim further improvements are still to come.

StringTable.Label: KrynnInvasionOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: The Way must be accepted by all sentient beings for us to achieve salvation. That can be accomplished by persuasion and argument. Or it can be accomplished by making less sentient beings.

StringTable.Label: KrynnGravitationalFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Our weapons researchers have developed tools which allow us to manipulate gravitational fields. These horrible weapons should only be used when all other forms of persuasion have failed.

StringTable.Label: KrynnJihadFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Krynniac Jihad

StringTable.Label: KrynnJihadFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves planetary Holy War capabilities.

StringTable.Label: KrynnJihadFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Those that fallow the Path have no fear, their faith filling them with confidence and a strength that can be used against the unbelievers in a variety of ways.

StringTable.Label: KrynnDevineMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Divine Mastery

StringTable.Label: KrynnDevineMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves ship based Holy War capabilities.

StringTable.Label: KrynnDevineMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Crews and officers that fully master the Path and comprehend the Way in all its beauty will find that the weapons of the unbelievers hold less menace for them.

StringTable.Label: KrynnDefensiveSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: We've set up a separate team of devoted researchers to devise ways to protect against the weapons our devious weapons researchers are coming up with. Already these blessed minds are finding ways to improve upon their work.

StringTable.Label: KrynnShieldOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Thanks to the diligent work of our defensive researchers, our shields continually get better. Their work is a shining example of what minds that follow the Path are capable of.

StringTable.Label: KrynnBarrierSystemFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Our defensive researchers are ashamed of themselves due to several oversights in the implementation of our Barrier Fields. After their self-cleansing ritual concludes, they promise to upgrade these systems immediately.

StringTable.Label: KrynnShieldMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: The shields of Krynn vessels are famed throughout the galaxy, even the unbelievers unable to deny their effectiveness. But there is no end to the Path, and our defensive researchers continue to look for ways to improve upon their excellence.

StringTable.Label: KrynnPointDefenseOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Our point defense systems are still primitive, with much room for improvement. As our defensive researchers become more enlightened about their capabilities, we should see some positive changes.

StringTable.Label: KrynnCounterMeasureFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Our defensive researchers have been working tirelessly on our counter measure systems, a labor made easier by the knowledge that their efforts will save the lives of other Krynn.

StringTable.Label: KrynnDroneSystemMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Drones, despite lacking sentience, are our most faithful warriors, tirelessly working to protect the lives of Krynn crews. Our defensive researchers adore them, and work almost as energetically to make them more capable.

StringTable.Label: KrynnArmorOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Our armor will never be good enough, not as long as there are still hostile unbelievers in this galaxy. Our defensive researchers must do everything in their power to improve upon their work.

StringTable.Label: KrynnArmorFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: As our armor systems become more complicated, only our most enlightened, most pious researchers can keep up with the science involved. But this winnowing process makes it easier for good ideas to rise to the top.

StringTable.Label: KrynnArmorMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Krynn vessels are as sturdy and reliable as any in the galaxy, protected by armor imbued with the faith of an entire people. And still our diligent defensive researchers work to make it better.

StringTable.Label: KrynnDiplomaticSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: By studying the history and culture of the unbelievers who surround us, we might better understand them, and more ably convince them to join the Path.

StringTable.Label: KrynnPoliticalSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: Throughout our history, the Krynn have experienced a wide variety of governments. All have been acceptable, so long as the goal that they aim for remained the same.

StringTable.Label: KrynnPoliticalFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Installing a new political theory in our people is a trivial thing, requiring only new instructions be delivered to our clergy on how best to guide their flocks on the new branch of the Path we're setting down.

StringTable.Label: KrynnPoliticalMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: So great are our powers of persuasion that we can now steer the minds of our people to either extreme of morality with incredible ease.

StringTable.Label: KrynnDiplomaticOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: All treaties encourage peaceful relations, making them ideal for influencing our neighbors spiritual lives. But some treaties have other, more secular effects, which we'd do well to consider.

StringTable.Label: KrynnAllianceFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: We should consider what our neighbors can offer us when forming alliances with them. Although bringing them on to the Path is the long term goal, we will have many intermediate goals along the way.

StringTable.Label: KrynnThePathSpecialization_Name
StringTable.String: The Krynniac Paths

StringTable.Label: KrynnThePathSpecialization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Enlightens our entire civilization.

StringTable.Label: KrynnThePathSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: Although all Krynn must follow the Path, there is some room for individualization and expression. Depending on how we move along the Path, the influence and internal approval of our entire civilization might be affected.

StringTable.Label: KrynnTheCallingOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: The Krynniac Callings

StringTable.Label: KrynnTheCallingOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Enlightens our entire civilization.

StringTable.Label: KrynnTheCallingOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Not all Callings are created equally, and depending on the challenges that confront our civilization, we may wish to support those who have chosen a specific Calling.

StringTable.Label: KrynnTheOrderFocus_Name
StringTable.String: The Krynniac Orders

StringTable.Label: KrynnTheOrderFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Enlightens our entire civilization.

StringTable.Label: KrynnTheOrderFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: All of the Krynniac Orders are critical to the functioning of our civilization, though in some situations it may behoove us to strengthen one Order above the others.

StringTable.Label: KrynnTheWayPerfection_Name
StringTable.String: The Krynniac Way

StringTable.Label: KrynnTheWayPerfection_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Enlightens our entire civilization.

StringTable.Label: KrynnTheWayPerfection_Dec
StringTable.String: Those who have found the Way understand the importance of convincing the entire galaxy to walk the Path along with us. We must do anything we can do to support their work.

StringTable.Label: KrynnCommerceSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: A representative from the Secret Order has approached us with some "suggestions" about how to improve our handling of the economy. Suggestions from this channel are often not suggestions at all.

StringTable.Label: KrynnEconomicFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: The Secret Order has provided us with a list of economic initatives they'd like us to persue. We don't have to do everything on this list, but they promise that whatever we do will be worth our while.

StringTable.Label: KrynnTradeOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Trading is a secular activity, one enlightened Krynn have little to do with. But the Secret Order have many ideas how we could adjust our trading activites to our benefit. And, no doubt, to theirs.

StringTable.Label: KrynnTradeFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: No longer satisfied by their regular profiteering, the Secret Order is now encouraging us to restructure our trading activities to target specific economic sectors.
